text: The trucks drove through Tokyo Kingdom at full speed.

name: Me
text: (We should reach Tokyo Kingdom Bridge soon... and then we're out of Tokyo Kingdom.)
The mercenaries were each on alert inside the trucks, in order to be able to enter battle at any time.

name: Me
text: (But still, those drones earlier... although they were disguised, the attackers were definitely from the UFS.)

name: Me
text: (Even if we say "the" UFS, there's actually some variety. I heard that even within Japan, multiple UFS agencies are fighting for control. What a pain.)

name: Me
text: (I wonder which UFS agency attacked us earlier...)

name: Me
text: (It makes me all the more curious about the contents of the "cargo.")

name: Sakura
text: Fuma-kun, by the way.

name: Me
text: Hm? What is it, Sakura?

name: Sakura
text: She's not here. The woman you fought in the test.

name: Me
text: Tsubaki...? Now that you mention it, yeah she isn't.

name: Sakura
text: I feel like I saw her briefly at the meeting place... Maybe she isn't joining the convoy?

name: Sakura
text: Tsubaki-san was super strong, so it would've been great to have her with us.

name: Me
text: (She's right, is there some reason a soldier as skilled as her wouldn't take part in the operation? Does she have some other important duty?)

name: Sakura
text: And also...

name: Sakura
text: I think I've seen that woman somewhere before. I wanted to talk to her for a bit.
Hey, it's an ambush!!!
Enemy attack! It's an enemy attack! All units into positions!!!

name: Me
text: !!! Sakura!

name: Sakura
text: Yup! Let's go!!
Had they anticipated the route of the transport trucks?
Just as we had entered a bottleneck, a squad of drones blocked our path.

name: Mercenaries
text: What the hell!? That's a shitload of drones!!

name: Mercenaries
text: They're behind us too!!
Enough drones to surprise even the experienced mercenaries were literally filling the street and expanding their battle formation.

name: Faust
text: Use-the-trucks-as-shields-and-move-into-the-alley. Establish-a-defensive-formation!
Upon Faust's calm orders, the mercenaries used the trucks as cover, entered the alley, and took defensive positions.

name: Me
text: That mechanical woman, she's spot on.

name: Sakura
text: Wh-What do we do, Fuma-kun?!

name: Me
text: Hmm...

name: Me
text: I peeked at the driver's seat earlier and caught a glimpse of our route. Once we're out of Tokyo Kingdom, we'll reach our destination in no time.

name: Sakura
text: Hmhm. Which means?

name: Me
text: Which means, this is most likely the last chance for us to set the aforementioned plan in motion.

name: Sakura
text: I see, got it!
The aforementioned plan, in other words, checking what was in the "cargo." After this, we would cross Tokyo Kingdom Bridge and there most likely wouldn't be any more big attacksー

name: Sakura
text: Then, I need to take them out with as much pizzazz as possible, right!!

name: Me
text: Yeah, and buy me some time while you're at it. I'm counting on you, Sakura!!
We nodded to each other and began our respective tasks.
